criticalSuccess.message: Choose two of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Linzi has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Linzi’s personal biases, one of Linzi’s resistances, or one of Linzi’s weaknesses. you can choose the same option twice to learn two pieces of information from the same category.

success.message: Choose one of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Linzi has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Linzi’s personal biases, one of Linzi’s resistances, or one of Linzi’s weaknesses.

criticalFailure.message: Choose a piece of information to learn about, as success, but the information is incorrect. For instance, you might think Linzi is susceptible to flattery when actually Linzi is resistant to flattery.
